ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Easily create interactive charts by leveraging the 'Echarts Javascript' library which includes 34 chart types, themes, 'Shiny' proxies and animations.
Easily create interactive charts by leveraging the 'Echarts Javascript' library which includes 34 chart types, themes, 'Shiny' proxies and animations.

name: r-echarts4r
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-echarts4r
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/echarts4r_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/echarts4r/echarts4r_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fcbe73189a13ab345994afb462334a3b11837843d1740f35205d7d1db7b2fbb2

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-broom
    - r-corrplot
    - r-countrycode
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.0
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-rstudioapi
    - r-purrr
    - r-scales
    - r-shiny
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-broom
    - r-corrplot
    - r-countrycode
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.0
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-rstudioapi
    - r-purrr
    - r-scales
    - r-shiny

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('echarts4r')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('echarts4r')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://echarts4r.john-coene.com/
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Easily create interactive charts by leveraging the 'Echarts Javascript' library which includes 34 chart types, themes, 'Shiny' proxies and animations.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: echarts4r
# Title: Create Interactive Graphs with 'Echarts JavaScript' Version 4
# Date: 2019-07-15
# Version: 0.2.3
# Authors@R: person("John", "Coene", email = "jcoenep@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Easily create interactive charts by leveraging the 'Echarts Javascript' library which includes 34 chart types, themes, 'Shiny' proxies and animations.
# License: Apache License (>= 2.0)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# Imports: htmlwidgets, magrittr, dplyr, purrr, countrycode, d3r, broom, shiny, scales, corrplot, data.tree, htmltools, jsonlite, stringi
# Suggests: tidyr
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# URL: http://echarts4r.john-coene.com/
# BugReports: https://github.com/JohnCoene/echarts4r/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-07-16 14:49:45 UTC; jcoe
# Author: John Coene [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: John Coene <jcoenep@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-18 06:37:08 UTC
